description: This module examines the enterprise considerations of occupational health. It includes key topics such as Occupational Health and Safety management systems, workplace health promotion, error prevention, safety culture and incident investigation. It integrates the various concepts and frameworks and contextualises it with industry practices, guidelines and legislation as practically applicable to an ongoing commercial enterprise.
title: Enterprise Occupational Health Practice
department: SSH School of Public Health Dean's Office
prerequisite:
SPH5311 Workplace Safety and Health; and
SPH5312 Assessment and Control of Occupational Hazards
